TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordDeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 使用 PBKDF1 算法的扩展从密码派生密钥。

span.span: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使用 PBKDF1 算法 PKCS #5 v2.0 标准中定义的扩展从密码派生字节适合用作密钥材料。This class uses an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm defined in the PKCS#5 v2.0 standard to derive bytes suitable for use as key material from a password. IETF RRC 2898 中记录了标准。The standard is documented in IETF RRC 2898. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿硬编码你的源代码中的密码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以从使用集中检索硬编码的密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六进制的编辑器中，或只需打开 notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥从密码使用类。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#1)]

Public Function CryptDeriveKey (algname As String, alghashname As String, keySize As Integer, rgbIV As Byte()) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ CryptDeriveKey(System::String ^ algname, System::String ^ alghashname, int keySize, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);

param.name: algname
param.span: 为其导出密钥的算法名称。

span.span: The algorithm name for which to derive the key.

param.name: alghashname
param.span: 用于导出密钥的哈希算法名称。

span.span: The hash algorithm name to use to derive the key.

param.name: keySize
param.span: 要导出的密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size of the key, in bits, to derive.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于导出密钥的初始化向量 (IV)。

span.span: The initialization vector (IV) to use to derive the key.

summary.span: 从 对象导出加密密钥。

span.span: Derives a cryptographic key from the object.
The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函数是加密 API 函数 CryptDeriveKey() 的包装器，并旨在提供与使用加密 API 的应用程序的互操作性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`参数设置为 0 位，则将使用指定的算法的默认密钥大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used. ## Examples 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#2)]

span.span: The parameter is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 无法获取加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

span.span: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
-or-

exception.span: 参数不是有效的算法名称。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid algorithm name.
-or-

exception.span: 参数不是有效的哈希算法名称。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] GetBytes (int cb);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetBytes(int32 cb) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (cb As Integer) As Byte()
public: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetBytes(int cb);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Rfc2898DeriveBytes replaces PasswordDeriveBytes for deriving key material from a password and is preferred in new applications.")

param.name: cb
param.span: 要生成的伪随机密钥字节数。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.
Returns pseudo-random key bytes.

returns.span: 由伪随机密钥字节组成的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以创建任意数量的伪随机字节。This method can create any number of pseudo-random bytes. 但是，哈希输出中的字节数受限制的字节序列的强度。However, the strength of the byte sequence is limited by the number of bytes in the hash output.

.property instance string HashName
Public Property HashName As String
public: property System::String ^ HashName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

exception.span: 哈希值的名称是固定的，尝试更改该值。

span.span: The name of the hash value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典攻击是一种攻击，攻击者尝试通过将以前计算的加密值的最可能的密钥的加密的值进行比较解密加密的消息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 困难得多的密码才能密钥派生末尾的随机字节简介进行这种攻击。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of random bytes at the end of the password before the key derivation. 这些随机字节被称为 salt。These random bytes are known as salt.

exception.span: 密钥 salt 值是固定的，尝试更改该值。

span.span: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
